Dark_Embrace.display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast
Dark_Embrace.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} protects you from lethal, smashing, and negative energy..

Death_Shroud.display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Death_Shroud.display_target_help: You are taking damage from the Death Shroud.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Murky_Cloud.display_help: You create a Murky Cloud enshrouding you. This cloud can absorb all forms of energy, making you more resistant to Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks, as well as Endurance Drain effects. Recharge: Fast
Murky_Cloud.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, End Drain)
Murky_Cloud.display_attacker_hit: You protect yourself from fire, cold, energy and negative energy damage with your {PowerName}.

Obsidian_Shield.display_help: You can create a special Obsidian Shield that grants good resistance to Psionic damage. With your mind enshrouded in darkness you are protected from Sleep, Fear, Hold and Disorient attacks. Recharge: Fast
Obsidian_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Psionic, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear)
Obsidian_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect yourself from psionic damage, Sleep, Fear and Disorient with your {PowerName}.

Dark_Regeneration.display_help: You can tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, thus healing yourself. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} regenerates {Damage} points of damage!

Cloak_of_Darkness.display_help: A shroud of Netherworld darkness envelops you, making you difficult to spot at a distance. You can be seen only at close range, or if you attack a target. Even if seen, the Cloak of Darkness grants you a bonus to Defense to all attacks attacks and some protection from Immobilization. This Netherworld Cloak also allows you to see things in a new light, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Unlike some stealth powers, Cloak of Darkness has no movement penalty. Cloak of Darkness will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Recharge: Slow

Cloak_of_Fear.display_help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, at reduced Accuracy. Recharge: Fast
Cloak_of_Fear.display_target_help: The Cloak of Fear has terrified you.

Oppressive_Gloom.display_help: The Netherworld has many mutable properties, such as the Oppressive Gloom. This power allows you to use your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.

Soul_Transfer.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can perform a Soul Transfer, sucking the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more life is restored to you. Drained foes are left Disoriented. The dark effects of this Soul Transfer will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.
Your {PowerName} steals {Damage} hit points and brings you back from the brink of death!

Thunder_Kick.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

Cobra_Strike.display_help: Using intense martial arts focus, you can perform a Cobra Strike that deals minor damage, but has a great chance of Disorienting your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Focus_Chi.display_help: Tapping into your inner Chi greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your Accuracy. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner chi with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Crane_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals minor smashing damage, but has a chance to Immobilize your target, as well as Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_target_help: The Crippling Axe Kick has crippled you. You are immobilized and your Running speed will be reduced once you can move again.

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Eagles_Claw.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Martial Arts attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Eagles_Claw.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special

Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals minimal Negative Energy damage, but sends foes flying and reduces their Accuracy. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Torrent.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Torrent.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Petrifying_Gaze.display_target_help: You are being held by the Petrifying Gaze.
Petrifying_Gaze.display_attacker_hit: Your {Powername} Immobilizes {PlayerDest} and reduces his defense.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's Accuracy. You must be level 44 and have Torrent or Petrifying Gaze before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their Accuracy. You must be level 47 and have two other Darkness Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you in place and reducing your Accuracy.

Super_Leap.display_help: Ravenstorm can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.
